recipe.title: Coconut-Lime Dressing
instructions: Whisk coconut milk, lime juice, fish sauce, shallot, and brown sugar in a small bowl until smooth. Gradually add oil, whisking constantly until emulsified.
Whisk coconut milk, lime juice, fish sauce, shallot, and brown sugar in a small bowl until smooth. Gradually add oil, whisking constantly until emulsified.
Do Ahead: Dressing can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and chill.
Dressing can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and chill.
